descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Add Zenithar Workshop in windhelm. This is collection of my work.
You can make unique masks, hats, outfits, etc.

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/7874]SE version[/url]

[/size][u][size=3]Language[/size]
[/u]Japanese
English
[url=http://www.skycitizen.net/?post=187911]Chinese[/url]

[u][size=3]Requirement[/size]
[/u]Skyrim 1.9
Dawnguard
Dragonborn

[u][size=3]Location[/size]
[/u]Windhelm, Gray Quarter
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/81196-2-1483146026.jpg[/img]

[u][size=3]How To Use[/size][/u]
1:Buy Coin from Zenith
2:Use Anvil[b][u]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/81196-0-1483148733.png[/img]
[/u][/b]
[u][size=3]Equip Slots[/size]
[/u]41: Hair OrnamentsÂ (Hat, Headband, Angel ring)
42: Forehead (Mask, Monocle, Eye patch, Visor)
45: Neck (Face Mask)
47: Back (Coffin, Spring)

If some equipment is invisible, It is Slot Conflict.
author: Vicn

files.name: Zenithar Workshop v140 CORE
files.changelogHtml:
Added 4 Female Outfits(Rurufon, Sharline, Beastmaster, Elfin)
Fixed and improved Yorha Outfits.
